import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import './Navbar.css'; const Navbar = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); }; return (
The Digital Bazar
  • Home
  • Men
  • Women
  • Kids
{/* User Auth Section */}
{user ? (
Hello, {user.name}
) : (
Sign In Register
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
